The House That Walked: A virtual reality game where players take on the role of a character with the ability to walk on walls and ceilings. The game challenges players to navigate through increasingly complex levels, using their powers to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles.

The House That Walked: A mobile app that uses augmented reality to superimpose a character with the ability to walk on walls and ceilings onto the real world. Users can interact with the character and even control its movements, making it a fun and interactive way to explore their surroundings.

The House That Walked: A comic book series that follows the adventures of a character with the ability to walk on walls and ceilings. Each issue features a new story and art style, showcasing the character's powers in different ways.

The House That Walked: A podcast that tells the story of a person who discovers their ability to walk on walls and ceilings. Each episode features interviews with real-life people who have experienced this ability, as well as discussions of the science and psychology behind it.
